dict.string: MyPIM needs to access the Camera so that you can take a photo.
Face ID or Touch ID is used to authenticate you as the real user of the app!
MyPIM needs to obtain your location while taking or picking a photo so that its location can be shown on a map.
Microphone is used to record your voice to create Voice Notes and to record your speech so that it can be converted to text.
MyPIM needs to access your Photo Library so that you can pick a photo from it.
MyPIM needs to use Speech Recognition to convert your speech into text.
